content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: TEENRL
      operator: contains
      value: $ta_arm
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0324
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: TEENRL should not reference a specific ARM.  This rule has only been
  partially executed to identify explicit references to ARM.
Operations:
  - domain: TA
    id: $ta_arm
    name: ARM
    operator: distinct
Outcome:
  Message: TEENRL refers to a specific ARM
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0324
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The Trial Arms dataset, not the Trial Elements dataset,
                  describes where the subject moves next, so TEENRL must be expressed
                  without referring to Arm.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Assumption 13
                Section: 7.2.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - STUDY REFERENCE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TE

json.Description: TEENRL should not reference a specific ARM.  This rule has only been partially executed to identify explicit references to ARM.

Outcome.Message: TEENRL refers to a specific ARM

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The Trial Arms dataset, not the Trial Elements dataset, describes where the subject moves next, so TEENRL must be expressed without referring to Arm.
